title: Embedding from the extended real numbers into a complete lattice

blocks.name: cxrh
blocks.content: Map the extended real numbers into a complete lattice.

blocks.name: df-xrh
blocks.content: Define an embedding from the extended real number into a complete lattice. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Feb-2018.)

blocks.name: xrhval
blocks.content: The value of the embedding from the extended real numbers into a complete lattice. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Feb-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm xrhval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cxrh, c0), cmpt(s0, cxr, cif(cfv(cfv(crrh, c0), cv(s0)), cif(cfv(c2, c3), cfv(c4, c3), wceq(cv(s0), cpnf)), wcel(cv(s0), cr)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cima(cfv(crrh, c0), cr))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cglb, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(club, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cxrh, c0), cmpt(s0, cxr, cif(cfv(cfv(crrh, c0), cv(s0)), cif(cfv(c2, c3), cfv(c4, c3), wceq(cv(s0), cpnf)), wcel(cv(s0), cr)))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, cxrh, cmpt(s0, cxr, cif(cfv(cfv(crrh, c0), cv(s0)), cif(cfv(c2, c3), cfv(c4, c3), wceq(cv(s0), cpnf)), wcel(cv(s0), cr))), cmpt(s0, cxr, cif(cfv(cfv(crrh, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cif(cfv(cfv(club, cv(hs0)), cima(cfv(crrh, cv(hs0)), cr)), cfv(cfv(cglb, cv(hs0)), cima(cfv(crrh, cv(hs0)), cr)), wceq(cv(s0), cpnf)), wcel(cv(s0), cr))))
  mpteq2dv(s0, cxr, cif(cfv(cfv(crrh, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cif(cfv(cfv(club, cv(hs0)), cima(cfv(crrh, cv(hs0)), cr)), cfv(cfv(cglb, cv(hs0)), cima(cfv(crrh, cv(hs0)), cr)), wceq(cv(s0), cpnf)), wcel(cv(s0), cr)), cif(cfv(cfv(crrh, c0), cv(s0)), cif(cfv(c2, c3), cfv(c4, c3), wceq(cv(s0), cpnf)), wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  ifeq12d(cfv(cfv(crrh, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cif(cfv(cfv(club, cv(hs0)), cima(cfv(crrh, cv(hs0)), cr)), cfv(cfv(cglb, cv(hs0)), cima(cfv(crrh, cv(hs0)), cr)), wceq(cv(s0), cpnf)), cfv(cfv(crrh, c0), cv(s0)), cif(cfv(c2, c3), cfv(c4, c3), wceq(cv(s0), cpnf)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  fveq1d(cfv(crrh, cv(hs0)), cv(s0), cfv(crrh, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  ifeq12d(cfv(cfv(club, cv(hs0)), cima(cfv(crrh, cv(hs0)), cr)), cfv(cfv(cglb, cv(hs0)), cima(cfv(crrh, cv(hs0)), cr)), cfv(c2, c3), cfv(c4, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), cpnf))
  fveq12d(cfv(club, cv(hs0)), cima(cfv(crrh, cv(hs0)), cr), c2, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(club, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(club, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, club)
  fveq12d(cfv(cglb, cv(hs0)), cima(cfv(crrh, cv(hs0)), cr), c4, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cglb, cv(hs0)), c4, cfv(cglb, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cglb)
  syl6eqr(cima(cfv(crrh, cv(hs0)), cr), c3, cima(cfv(crrh, c0), cr), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  imaeq1d(cfv(crrh, cv(hs0)), cr, cfv(crrh, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, crrh)
  df-xrh(hs0, s0)
  mptex(s0, cxr, cif(cfv(cfv(crrh, c0), cv(s0)), cif(cfv(c2, c3), cfv(c4, c3), wceq(cv(s0), cpnf)), wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  xrex()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, cxr, cif(cfv(cfv(crrh, c0), cv(s0)), cif(cfv(c2, c3), cfv(c4, c3), wceq(cv(s0), cpnf)), wcel(cv(s0), cr))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cxr.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm xrhval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(RR*Hom ` c0)=(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚Ü¶ if(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù,((RRHom ` c0)` s0), if(s0 = +‚àû,(c2 ` c3),(c4 ` c3)))))
  ‚ä£ c3 =((RRHom ` c0)" ‚Ñù)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(glb ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(lub ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  syl(c0 ‚àà c1, (RR*Hom ` c0)=(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚Ü¶ if(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù,((RRHom ` c0)` s0), if(s0 = +‚àû,(c2 ` c3),(c4 ` c3)))), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, cxrh, (s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚Ü¶ if(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù,((RRHom ` c0)` s0), if(s0 = +‚àû,(c2 ` c3),(c4 ` c3)))), (s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚Ü¶ if(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù,((RRHom ` hs0)` s0), if(s0 = +‚àû,((lub ` hs0)`((RRHom ` hs0)" ‚Ñù)),((glb ` hs0)`((RRHom ` hs0)" ‚Ñù))))))
  mpteq2dv(s0, cxr, if(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù,((RRHom ` hs0)` s0), if(s0 = +‚àû,((lub ` hs0)`((RRHom ` hs0)" ‚Ñù)),((glb ` hs0)`((RRHom ` hs0)" ‚Ñù)))), if(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù,((RRHom ` c0)` s0), if(s0 = +‚àû,(c2 ` c3),(c4 ` c3))), hs0 = c0)
  ifeq12d(((RRHom ` hs0)` s0), if(s0 = +‚àû,((lub ` hs0)`((RRHom ` hs0)" ‚Ñù)),((glb ` hs0)`((RRHom ` hs0)" ‚Ñù))), ((RRHom ` c0)` s0), if(s0 = +‚àû,(c2 ` c3),(c4 ` c3)), hs0 = c0, s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  fveq1d((RRHom ` hs0), s0, (RRHom ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  ifeq12d(((lub ` hs0)`((RRHom ` hs0)" ‚Ñù)), ((glb ` hs0)`((RRHom ` hs0)" ‚Ñù)), (c2 ` c3), (c4 ` c3), hs0 = c0, s0 = +‚àû)
  fveq12d((lub ` hs0), ((RRHom ` hs0)" ‚Ñù), c2, c3, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((lub ` hs0), c2, (lub ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, club)
  fveq12d((glb ` hs0), ((RRHom ` hs0)" ‚Ñù), c4, c3, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((glb ` hs0), c4, (glb ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cglb)
  syl6eqr(((RRHom ` hs0)" ‚Ñù), c3, ((RRHom ` c0)" ‚Ñù), hs0 = c0)
  imaeq1d((RRHom ` hs0), cr, (RRHom ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, crrh)
  df-xrh(hs0, s0)
  mptex(s0, cxr, if(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù,((RRHom ` c0)` s0), if(s0 = +‚àû,(c2 ` c3),(c4 ` c3))))
  xrex()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚Ü¶ if(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù,((RRHom ` c0)` s0), if(s0 = +‚àû,(c2 ` c3),(c4 ` c3)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cxr.s(s0)
}
